entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this morning. Blowing snow at times this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow at times this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
